message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.CL 

The paper proposes a new method for increasing the receptive field of convolutions on 3D point clouds, which is directly related to the performance of dense tasks such as semantic segmentation. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a new mechanism that can be integrated into existing methods, which suggests that it may also belong to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The paper also evaluates the proposed method on the task of 3D semantic segmentation, which suggests that it may belong to the graphics (cs.GR) sub-category. Finally, the paper involves analyzing and visualizing the receptive field, which suggests that it may also belong to the natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-category.
